full_summary:
# Business Process and Project Management Services
***

## Tender Details

**Tender Title**: Business Process and Project Management Services (E60ZT-18TSPS)
**Short Description**:  This procurement seeks to obtain the services of Business Process Consultants and Project Managers to review, analyze, and map existing business processes, identify opportunities for process alignment, and propose solutions for improved business processes.

**Reference Number**: PW-22-01008339
**Amendment Number**: 2
**Publication Date**: September 28, 2022
**Tender Closing Date**: November 21, 2022, 2:00 PM (EST)
**Expected Contract Start Date**: Contract award date
**Expected Contract End Date**: November 30, 2025

## Notice Type
This is a Request for Proposal (RFP) notice under a Trade Agreement: Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA).

## Method of Procurement
Competitive - Selective Tendering

## Contact Information

* **Contracting Authority**: Christine Madore
* **Email**: Christine.Madore@sac-isc.gc.ca
* **Phone**: 819-956-8245
* **Address**: 10 Wellington St., Gatineau, QC K1A 0H4, Canada

## Description of Requirement

Indigenous Services Canada (ISC) is seeking the services of Business Process Consultants and Project Managers, at different levels of expertise, to review, analyze, and map existing business processes, identify opportunities for process alignment, and propose solutions for improved business processes. The consulting services will ensure the smooth operations of current and future business needs.

## Proposed Contract Period

* The resulting contract will be awarded for an initial period of two years, including two additional one-year option periods.
* The project will require an estimated 2200 days of effort for the initial contract period and 60 days for each additional option year.

## Security Requirement
A Protected B minimum security level is required.

## Applicable Trade Agreements

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-United Kingdom Trade Continuity Agreement
